title: Retrieve fees for withdrawing a listing
description: Returns the fees that will be charged for withdrawing a listing. An error is reported if the listing cannot be withdrawn.
permission_required: MyTradeMeWrite: Maintain your watchlist, answer questions and post comments.

enum.name: xml
enum.description: Serialize responses into XML.

enum.name: json
enum.description: Serialize responses into JSON.

fields.name: ListingId
fields.description: The ID of the listing that is being withdrawn, relisted or extended.

fields.name: ReturnListingDetails
fields.description: Indicates whether full listing details should be returned in the Listing field.

fields.name: Type
fields.description: Indicates whether this withdrawl request is for a listing that sold or not.

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason for withdrawing the listing, if the listing has not sold. Max 255 characters.

fields.name: SalePrice
fields.description: The amount the listing sold for, if the listing has sold.

fields.name: Success
fields.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the error, if the operation failed.

fields.name: TotalCost
fields.description: The total price for the listing.

fields.name: InsufficientBalance
fields.description: Indicates the member has insufficient funds to pay the total price for the listing.

fields.name: FeeItems
fields.description: A collection of member ledger items.

fields.name: TotalCount
fields.type:
TotalCount 
 Integer 

The total number of results in the collection. Can be larger than the number of returned results.



 Page 
 Integer 

The index of the current page of results (starts at 1).



 PageSize 
 Integer 

The number of results in the current page.



 List 
 Collection of <MemberLedgerItem> or null 

A list of the results in the current page.






 Date 
 DateTime 

The transaction date.



 Type 
 Enumeration 

The transaction type.



 Description 
 String or null 

A description of the transaction.



 Credit 
 Number 

The amount to credit to the member's account.



 Debit 
 Number 

The amount to debit from the member's account.



 WillBeInvoiced 
 Boolean 

Indicates whether this ledger item will be invoiced, rather than deducted from the member's trade me balance.



 InvoicedValue 
 Number 

The amount that will be invoiced to the member

enum.name: Other
enum.description: An unknown ledger item.

enum.name: ListingFee
enum.description: The fee for a listing an item (applies to classifieds and auctions in certain categories).

enum.name: HighVolumeFee
enum.description: The fee for exceeding the free listing allowance.

enum.name: SuccessFeeBid
enum.description: The fee for a successful auction (won via a bid).

enum.name: SuccessFeeOffer
enum.description: The fee for a successful auction (won via a fixed price offer).

enum.name: SuccessFeeBuyNow
enum.description: The fee for a successful auction (won via Buy Now).

enum.name: GalleryPromotion
enum.description: The fee for listing an item with the gallery promotion.
